messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Looking for Animal Crossing friend- Nintendo DS game
messages.msgSnippet: you can play one of 2 ways- - within 30ft range of the other player... like in the same room/house. or - using a wireless Internet. but for security reasons-
messages.messageBody:
you can play one of 2 ways-

- within 30ft range of the other player... like in the same room/house.
or
- using a wireless Internet.

but for security reasons- you must know the name of the person you want to
play with so you can connect to them by knowing their player name. you can
not search for random people who are playing at the same time . so... thats
why we were trying to find a like minded- maybe- homeschooler- to play with
via wireless interenet.

i- amy

> >
> > THX,
> >
> > Amy

messages.subject: Looking for Animal Crossing friend- Nintendo DS game
messages.msgSnippet: My 12 yr old wants to play Animal Crossing with others- using the wireless connection. Any animal crossing players out there? Do you have a wireless connection
messages.messageBody:
My 12 yr old wants to play
Animal Crossing with others- using the wireless connection.

Any animal crossing players out there?
Do you have a wireless connection setup on your Nintendo ?

Let us know if you want a long distance friend... i suppose this is
sort of like a pen pal ... but only for animal crossing.

THX,

Amy
